translations: n.护目镜，防护眼镜（goggle 的复数）
v.瞪大眼睛看；转动眼珠（goggle 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: You must wear goggles and a mask that will protect you against the fumes.
sentences.translation: 你必须带上护目镜和防护面具，以保护你不被烟熏。

sentences.sentence: Instead of waiting to see if tears will help, some people use goggles.
sentences.translation: 有些人不是等着看眼泪是否会起作用，而是用护目镜。

sentences.sentence: They might look funny, but goggles do serious work! Why do people need to wear goggles?
sentences.translation: 护目镜看起来可能很滑稽，但确实能发挥重要作用！为什么人们需要戴护目镜？
